# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and functionality. Given its quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $125. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of both utility and satisfaction. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
